Lighting Color Study

This illustration was completed as a study of lighting and color palettes, choosing different colors in the same image to denote warm verses cool lighting situations.



I began by coloring the image with a warm color palette. Then, after drawing the shadow line, I changed the colors to the left of that line to be the original colorsâ€™ cool counterparts, adding in blues and purples and slightly desaturing the hue. This was to give the portrait the sense that this girl was stepping into a warm pool of sunlight.
